issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description: the standard for events fired in Titanium is that we always provide source and type (e.g. e.source and e.type) verify that this value matches across platform
fields.summary: Write functional tests to check events to ensure that source and type are returned and match with Android and iOS
